entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is trying to catch a book that has escaped.

entities.name: the book
entities.description: A magical book that has escaped from Harry's grasp and is hiding under his desk. It is described as 'The Monster Book'.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Someone who has sent a card to Harry, which he needs to use the book.

entities.name: hedwig and errol
entities.description: Harry's owls, who are watching him as he tries to catch the book.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: One of Harry's relatives, who is sleeping in the room next door and gives a loud, sleepy grunt when the book flaps past him.

relationships.description: Harry is chasing after the book as it escapes from under his desk and scuttles across the room.
Hedwig and Errol are watching Harry as he tries to catch the book.
